Package com.eng.game.entities

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
com.eng.game.actor.GameActor
com.eng.game.entities.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
CannonBall, College, Ship, TreasureChest
public abstract class Entity
extends GameActor
Main actor class for all non-inanimate objects in the game.

    • addItem

      public void addItem​(Item item)

    • pickup

      public boolean pickup()
      Picks up the item on the same tile as the entity. If there is no item on the tile, nothing happens. If the entity is holding an item, the item is dropped.
      Returns:
      true if an item was picked up, false otherwise

    • drop

      public boolean drop()
      Drops the item at the entities item index. The item is removed from the holding and placed on the map. The item will be placed on an empty tile around the entity.
      Returns:
      true if the item was dropped, false otherwise

    • dropAll

      public boolean dropAll()
      Drops every item in the entity's holding.

    • switchItem

      public void switchItem​(int index)
      Switches the item in the entity's holding to the item at the given index. If the index is out of bounds, nothing happens. If the index is the same as the current item index, nothing happens.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the item to switch to

    • useItem

      public void useItem()

    • useItem

      public void useItem​(float x, float y)

    • damage

      public void damage​(float damage)
      Decreases the entity's health by the specified amount. If the entity's health is 0 or less, it is considered dead.
      Parameters:
      damage - the amount of damage to deal

    • heal

      public void heal​(int heal)
      Heals the entity by the specified amount. Will only be healed up to the entity's max health.
      Parameters:
      heal - the amount to heal

    • die

      public void die()
      Kills the entity. If the entity is a player, the game is over. Entity is removed from the map.

    • open

      public boolean open​(Key key)
      Performs an action if supplied a valid key By default, does nothing
      Parameters:
      key - the key to check
      Returns:
      true if the key was valid, false otherwise

    • getMovementRange

      public java.lang.Integer getMovementRange()

    • getFiringRange

      public java.lang.Integer getFiringRange()
      Returns:
      the range of the cannon the entity is holding

    • isOutOfRange

      public boolean isOutOfRange​(float x, float y)
      Checks if coordinates are outside the enitites bounds
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate
      y - y coordinate
      Returns:
      true if coordinates are outside the entities bounds
